name: Command Window
description:
Command Window is a collection of arcade games that I created over time. The design is much like a Window's terminal. Created using Python, and Pygame. This games will probably contain a lot of bugs. Will continue to update this game whenever I can.

Playable Games:
    Shmup1
    Frogger
    Game Of Life

Controls:
    run (game)
    credits
    "P" = Pause
    "Esc" = Exit
    "C" = Controls In-game

Credits:
    Sound effects: Bfxr - https://www.bfxr.net
    Made with: Python and Pygame
